content.value:
To the @fsf:
There was no future where you became relevant again. But you could have chosen to use your legacy to elevate a new generation and gracefully retire.
Instead you chose to pander to those bleating endless vapid freedom slogans and supporting a terrible man.
Screw you.
content.html: To the @fsf: There was no future where you became relevant again. But you could have chosen to use your legacy to elevate a new generation and gracefully retire. Instead you chose to pander to those bleating endless vapid freedom slogans and supporting a terrible man. Screw you.
